example.text: Today at the White House, Speaker McCarthy refused to take default off the table. President Biden said he would. Leader Jeffries said he would. I said I would. But Speaker McCarthy instead gave us a plan to take default hostage. [[url]]
I will continue working with them to move it forward.
I’ve pushed FDA for years on this issue. And today, this is a big step in the right direction to correct this misguided policy and allow more gay and bisexual men to donate blood. [[url]]

When asked to clarify, GOP Senator Tuberville responded: “What is a white nationalist?” Are you kidding me? Then he followed up: “I look at a white nationalist as a Trump Republican” Senate GOP must denounce his words and tell him to drop his holds on military appointments now [[url]]

Today at the White House, Speaker McCarthy refused to take default off the table. President Biden said he would. Leader Jeffries said he would. I said I would. But Speaker McCarthy instead gave us a plan to take default hostage. [[url]]
I have just filed a cloture motion that would finally restore to Congress the power to declare war. I yield the floor.

The Senate unanimously passed a bill to require FAA to look into resiliency and cybersecurity of the NOTAM system. Nobody wants a repeat of the chaos and delay at airports back in January when this system went down. This bill will get the FAA to take a hard look at its systems.
